name: FDL
description:
FDL is a top down 2D rouge like game where you play as a junkie who, along with his trusty frog companion, George, go on an intense Sci-Fi drug fueled adventure to bring down the evil space mafia flies, narcotics operation.

Your objective is to progress through the games levels whilst shooting flies and picking up items to increase your score. At this stage in the game their are 16 levels and two boss fights. Post your high scores in the comments bellow and feel free to suggest any additions and improvements we can make.
